NewHope

#RSAC
NewHope is a Key Encapsulation Mechanism (KEM)

1. Key Generation
A pair (pk,sk) is drawn
2. Decapsulation
Alice recovers Bob's random key using her secret key

pk
2. Encapsulation
A random key is drawn and encapsulated with Alice's public
key
Encapsulated key
